item.title: Josh O’Connor Plans an Art Heist in ‘The Mastermind’ Trailer
item.description: The Kelly Reichardt-written and -directed film also stars Alana Haim, Gaby Hoffman, John Magaro, Hope Davis and Bill Camp.
